text: Our World, Our Way is the third and final studio album by Dem Franchize Boyz. It was their only album on Koch Records, and was released September 30, 2008.Our World, Our Way: Dem Franchize Boyz: Music The album's first single is "Talkin' Out da Side of Ya Neck!."Dem Franchize Boyz interview. DJBooth.net. Accessed February 29, 2008. Other tracks on the album "Mr. Feel Good" (featuring Mannie Fresh)MTV News staff (January 25, 2008). Jennifer Lopez And Marc Anthony Do Disney MTV. Accessed February 3, 2008. and "Turn Heads" (featuring Lloyd). Bangladesh, the producer of "Bossy" by Kelis, produced "Talkin' Out da Side of Ya Neck,"IGN Music. Dem Franchise Boyz reach The Point of No Return: Mark March 25th on your calendars. ign.com. Retrieved 29/02/08. released as a single in January.Billboard (January 9, 2008). Dem Franchize Boyz Prep Their 'Return' Billboard. Accessed February 21, 2008. Others involved in the project include members of the group Pretty Ricky and producer Maestro.Friday Morning Quarterback Album Report. (January 9, 2008) Quick Hits: People's Choice Awards, Dem Franchize Boyz, Lil Wayne, Metallica, Rise Against, The Fray, Bamboozle, Rolling Stones. FMQB.com. Accessed February 29, 2008. Recently it was announced that the group has been released from capitol and has signed to Koch Records, where the album will have a new name and a new release date. The current single from the album is "Turn Heads", a collaboration with R&B; singer Lloyd. The song premiered on August 12, 2008 and the video premiered on Yahoo! Music on August 28.XXL Magazine. Dem Franchize Boyz Set September Date For New LP. XXLMag.com.
